title: Glycol Chilling System with Holding Tank
item_description:
Glycol Chilling System with Holding Tank

  • Width: 104.5”
  • Length: 185”
  • Height: 117”

Loading Note: Rigging and loading assistance will be provided by a licensed professional rigging company contracted by West Auctions. Rigging company will load this item using a crane. Rigging company will only load this item on a flat trailer or flatbed. No box trucks, car trailers, etc will be loaded. Loading assistance does not include additional crating, palletizing, packaging, or securing, etc. All piping and electrical will be disconnected by the rigging company.

Removal Note: This item is available for removal by appointment only from July 21, 2025 through July 25, 2025. Please contact West Auctions to schedule your appointment.
